amendment.description: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 110-136 to require the U.S. Department of Homeland Security to consult with states prior to sharing information on forthcoming grant awards, including when sharing information with the U.S. Congress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in House Report 110-136 to require the U.S. Department of Homeland Security to consult with states prior to sharing information on forthcoming grant awards, including when sharing information with the U.S. Congress.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Terry amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
